Question: Show me stories from the [[fandom]] fandom
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?title WHERE {  ?story golem:fandom "[[fandom]]" . ?story golem:title ?title . }

Question: Show me all the stories from the [[fandom]] universe
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?title  WHERE {  ?story golem:fandom “[[fandom]]“ . ?story golem:title ?title . }

Question: Is the story [[story]] completed?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?status WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:publicationStatus ?status . }

Question: When was [[story]] published?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:datePublished ?date . }

Question: What is the most recently uploaded story?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?title WHERE {  ?story golem:datePublished ?date . ?story golem:title ?title . } ORDER BY DESC(?date) LIMIT 1

Question: What stories were posted in 2015?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?title WHERE {  ?story golem:datePublished ?date . ?story golem:title ?title . FILTER(YEAR(xsd:datetime(?date))=2015) . }

Question: What are the keywords of [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT  (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?keyword; separator=", ") AS ?keywords ) WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:keyword ?keyword . }

Question: Is keyword [[keyword]] a given keyword in [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?keyword WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:keyword ?keyword . FILTER(?keyword = "[[keyword]]") . }

Question: How many chapters does [[story]] have?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?chapters WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:numberOfChapters ?chapters . }

Question: What is the content rating for the story [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?rating WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:rating ?rating . }

Question: How long is [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?chapters ?words WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:numberOfChapters ?chapters . ?story golem:numberOfWords ?words . }

Question: Does [[story]] have any content warnings?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?warning; separator=", ") AS ?warnings) WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:contentWarning ?warning . }

Question: Who is the author of [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?author WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:author ?author . }

Question: What collections is [[story]] part of?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?collections WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:collections ?collections . }

Question: What characters appear in [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT ?characters WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:characters ?characters . }

Question: What series is [[story]] a part of?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?series WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:series ?series . }

Question: Show me all multi-chapter stories
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?title WHERE {  ?story golem:title ?title . ?story golem:numberOfChapters ?chapters . FILTER(?chapters > 1) }

Question: How many Kudos did [[story]] receive?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?kudos WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:numberOfKudos ?kudos . }

Question: Where is [[story]] published?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?publisher WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:publisher ?publisher . }

Question: What is [[story]] about?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?series ?collection ?content_warning ?romantic_category (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?keyword; separator=", ") AS ?keywords) ?summary WHERE { ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:keyword ?keyword . ?story golem:romanticCategory ?romantic_category . ?story golem:series ?series . ?story golem:collections ?collection . ?story golem:contentWarning ?content_warning . ?story golem:summary ?summary . }

Question: Does a major character die in [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?warning WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:contentWarning ?warning . FILTER(?warning = "Major Character Death") }

Question: What stories is [[character]] featured in?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT ?title WHERE {  ?story golem:title ?title . ?story golem:characters "[[character]]" . }

Question: How many stories are uploaded per year?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?story) as ?uploads) WHERE {  ?story golem:story_id ?id }

Question: How many [[fandom]] stories are there?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?story) as ?stories) WHERE { ?story golem:fandom "[[fandom]]" . }

Question: How many Kudos do [[fandom]] stories get on average?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT AVG(?kudos) AS ?average_number_of_kudos WHERE { ?story golem:fandom "[[fandom]]" . ?story golem:numberOfKudos ?kudos . }

Question: How many authors have uploaded a story?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?author) as ?authors) WHERE { ?story golem:author ?author . }

Question: How many stories have received no feedback?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT COUNT(?story) as ?no_feedback_stories WHERE { ?story golem:numberOfComments ?comments . ?story golem:numberOfKudos ?kudos . FILTER(?comments=0 && ?kudos=0) }

Question: Who wrote [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT DISTINCT ?author WHERE {  ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:author ?author . }

Question: How many authors are represented in the data?

Question: How many stories are there on Archive of Our Own?

Question: What is the average number of comments for stories from [[fandom]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT AVG(?comments) AS ?avg_number_of_comments WHERE { ?story golem:fandom "[[fandom]]" . ?story golem:numberOfComments ?comments . }

Question: What is the MSTTR of [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT ?msttr  WHERE { ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:MSTTR ?msttr . }

Question: What is the Mean Segmental Token Type Ratio of [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT ?msttr  WHERE { ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:MSTTR ?msttr . }

Question: What is the average word length of [[story]]?

Question: How many stories are tagged as explicit?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT COUNT(?story) as ?explicit_stories WHERE { ?story golem:rating "Explicit" . }

Question: How much feedback do stories usually get?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT AVG(?kudos) AS ?average_number_of_kudos AVG(?comments) AS ?average_number_of_comments WHERE { ?story golem:numberOfKudos ?kudos . ?story golem:numberOfComments ?comments . }

SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT ?msttr  WHERE { ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:MSTTR ?msttr . }

Question: ¿Cual es el Mean Segmental Token Type Ratio de [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT ?msttr  WHERE { ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:MSTTR ?msttr . }

Question: ¿Cuál es la longitud de palabra promedio de [[story]]?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT ?avg_word_length WHERE { ?story golem:title "[[story]]" . ?story golem:averageWordLength ?avg_word_length . }

Question: ¿Cuántas historias están marcadas como explícitas?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT COUNT(?story) as ?explicit_stories WHERE { ?story golem:rating "Explicit" . }

Question: ¿Cuántas reacciones suele conseguir una historia?
SPARQL: prefix golem: <https://golemlab.eu/graph/>  prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> prefix gc: <https://ontology.golemlab.eu/>  SELECT AVG(?kudos) AS ?average_number_of_kudos AVG(?comments) AS ?average_number_of_comments WHERE { ?story golem:numberOfKudos ?kudos . ?story golem:numberOfComments ?comments . }
